data.actual_result: "Crap, we dropped the manifying glass. Uh... can you try searching again?" coming with a 400 error in debug log. Notice that the request parameters has `author_id=null`, which seems unintended
data.expected_result: As on Desktop, it should threat the invalid tag as the content of the search and the "from:" is ignored
data.short_description: Using the "from:" search filter on a user who isn't cached will break the search engine with a 400 error
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server and tap Search - Input `from:` - Input the Discord tag of an uncached user. If you're not sure of which user to pick, you can also input the tag of a user who isn't in the server
